DOC.brief_summary: Adding metformin to insulin therapy in pregnant women with diabetes mellitus who show insulin resistance may be equivalently effective to further raising the insulin dose
DOC.brief_title: Metformin as Adjuvant to Insulin Therapy in Insulin-resistant Diabetes Mellitus With Pregnancy
DOC.criteria: pregnant women with insulinresistant diabetes mellitus type1 diabetes mellitus secondary diabetes mellitus
